analysis.description:
Crowdsale._deliverTokens (/unique_chucks/4/0x5f824733d130ad85ec5e180368559cc89d14933d.sol#171-172) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(_beneficiary,_tokenAmount) (/unique_chucks/4/0x5f824733d130ad85ec5e180368559cc89d14933d.sol#171-172)

TimedCrowdsale.TimedCrowdsale (/unique_chucks/4/0x5f824733d130ad85ec5e180368559cc89d14933d.sol#277-286) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(_openingTime >= block.timestamp) (/unique_chucks/4/0x5f824733d130ad85ec5e180368559cc89d14933d.sol#282-284)

TimedCrowdsale.hasClosed (/unique_chucks/4/0x5f824733d130ad85ec5e180368559cc89d14933d.sol#292-295) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp > closingTime (/unique_chucks/4/0x5f824733d130ad85ec5e180368559cc89d14933d.sol#294-295)
